Who is Unicron firing at?


::Killfest/Greven/EndBringer/FZ::

Killfest's optics flash, firing two blasts to destroy the missiles. 
He fires three more shots from his EMP rifle as he lands on the 
ground, firing two missiles at the ground where Vehement was.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Greven laughs, easily taking the 25 shots into his heavy armor. The 
sonic blasts miss and he lands, firing four more missiles at Sun 
Crusher (two from each gun).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer lands on the ground, slightly shaking it as he does so. He 
immediately jumps at Reflector to tackle him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ smiles, watching the heat seeking missile slam into one of the 
energy seeking missiles. He sped up, easily outrunning the second one.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Vehement/Unicron/Reflector/Sun Crusher/Shockwave:
> 
> 
> Vehement easily shifted to the left, the electromagnetic pulses 
going past 
> him easily.  Two optic blasts were sent to intercept the missiles, 
shrapnel 
> striking his abdomen.
> 
> Raising his left arm, he launched two energy-signature seeking 
missiles at 
> Killfest, and two more from the other arm at FZ.
> 
> ---
> 
> Reflector fired an optic blast at the jet pack before it even got 
three 
> meters from EndBringer.  Raising an arm, he launched a heat seeking 
missile 
> at FZ.
> 
> ---
> 
> Unicron raised an arm, launching two energy-signature seeking 
missiles.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sun Crusher felt two missiles hit his armor, not penetrating the 
thick armor 
> plating.  The mounted machien gun swerved, firing off 25 armor-
piercing 
> rounds at Greven.
> 
> The smaller cannon swerved, launching off a sonic arc at Greven's 
legs.
> 
> The larger cannon fired off another three sonic shells at the 
Cybertronian 
> Fire.
> 
> ---
> 
> Shockwave launched another two missiles down at the Cybertronian 
Fire, flying 
> in an arc to get another shot off.
